New Records: Jeffery Vandersay took a six-wicket haul in his first ODI match since January
Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma was dismissed caught at point trying to reverse-sweep Vandersay
Shubman Gill was edged by Vandersay to first slip
Shivam Dube was trapped plumb in front by Vandersay
Virat Kohli was leg-before to Vandersay
Shreyas Iyer was rapped on the pads by Vandersay's googly
K.L. Rahul dragged one onto his stumps
Charith Asalanka dismissed Axar Patel and Washington Sundar in successive overs
Post-Match Reflections: India's innings crumbled once Rohit was dismissed
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka opted to bat first and posted 240 for nine
Avishka Fernando and Kusal Mendis set things straight by stitching a 74-run stand for the second wicket
Dunith Wellalage's late charge helped Sri Lanka get past 200
Wellalage got good support from Kamindu Mendis and forged a 72-run alliance for the seventh wicket
Others: Jeffery Vandersay was an eleventh-hour addition to the squad after Wanindu Hasaranga was ruled out on Saturday
